title: "Nearly half of Americans say they’ll never get in a self-driving taxi"
excerpt: "Three in five said that they'd have more trust in autonomous vehicles if they had a better understanding of how those vehicles worked, and 58 percent said that firsthand experience—i.e. going for a ride in a self-driving car—would make them trust the technology more."
